refnamediv.refpurpose: Controls the operation+ and operation- behaviour for Scilab

listitem.para: a single string amongst "on", "off" or "query". The behaviour mode for operation+ and operation-

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Controls the behaviour of the empty matrix addition and subtraction. On versions prior to scilab-6.0.0, adding or subtracting and empty matrix to any other value val would return val.
If behaviour == "off", adding or subtracting the empty matrix will yield to the empty matrix. This is the default behaviour of scilab after version 6.0.0.
If behaviour == "on", activates the behaviour prior to scilab-6.0.0.
If behaviour == "query", returns the current value ("on" or "off") for the oldEmptyBehaviour tag.

refsection.title: Examples

simplelist.member: warning for the warning behaviour on operation+ and operation-
plus for the behaviour of the operation+.
minus for the behaviour of the operation-.
